snippet.title: Doki Doki Storm teaser
snippet.description:
My first teaser for Doki Doki Storm, my NEWLY RELEASED Yuri POV game mod that I'm making for Doki Doki Literature Club.  It will follow Yuri's struggles with fitting in and her eventual descent into madness. 

Yay, it's finally done!  :D  Check out the mod here:  https://redd.it/it6vmx 



And my Discord server here:  https://discord.com/invite/f7HDrNY



 Edits to the Yuri sprite courtesy of u/SlightlySimple from the DDMC community.

This is a fan-made work based on Doki Doki Literature Club, the visual novel game by Team Salvato. I am not affiliated with Team Salvato. Their game can be downloaded from https://ddlc.moe/
